website_summaries.verdict: Classic design and look on a solid all-around basketball court shoe.
pros: Features the famed Asics gel cushioning system
Good ankle support and sturdy outsole
A comfortable shoe with a very recognizable classic design
They fit like boots but are light and comfortable
cons: Some users found they needed additional arch support

customer_reviews.title: Not for basketball. Maybe for fashion plates
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a couple dozen or more asics running and tennis shoes (trivia - since they were called Onitsuka and made track flats) and been very satisfied. These not so much, I was hoping to play basketball in them but injured myself on first wearing. They are suede, and offer little ankle support. Arch support is okay, cushioning is sub-par. They are basically a retro fashion shoe for walking around in, not playing basketball. Too bad as I loved my last pair of asics tennis shoes and the running shoes are usually a good value and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Runningpie

customer_reviews.title: Nice basketball shoe at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice basketball shoe at an affordable price. It is comfortable to run the court in this shoe, which has a light, cloud-like feel. I am a 12.5 and a size 13 in this shoe was a good fit, so I would say this shoe is pretty true to size. I like the throwback late 1980s styling, though that might not be for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Tiger

customer_reviews.title: A little small for me and I always need a good separate arch support (for all of my shoes though)
customer_reviews.text: Very cushiony ankle, the grey suede is nice, I am a woman's 10 and got an 8, I probably needed an 8.5. They look very sturdy and they are, but I still probably need a good arch support because they begin to hurt. But I am very finicky in that way plus I stand a lot at work, and I have worn these for work at times because I had nothing else. If I can't continue to wear something at work then I can't for walking/exercise either.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Not only good for him running (with super flat feet) but also ...
customer_reviews.text: The hubs has "sharp toes" and tears holes in the tops of his mesh running shoes. Needed to get him something that would stand up to that issue. These fit the bill. Not only good for him running (with super flat feet) but also look incredibly stylish with skinny jeans and a t-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ekay T

customer_reviews.title: Great great
customer_reviews.text: Love them ... get ur size . So comfortable I wear 9-1/2. Fits great color cool ...looks really good
customer_reviews.author: Gregory burkhead

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes - sharp colors! I got the black and red, buy new inserts and put those in though. The stock ones are flat and have no cushion really, now they are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Frechette

customer_reviews.title: Great Asics shoes
customer_reviews.text: Always been an Asics fan and these did not disappoint. Wore about two days to break them in and then under hard playing conditions. Great as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend and they fitted him perfectly. Product of great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Matos' Metal

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. The ankle support is thick but comfortable. Overall a good pair of hi-tops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best great looking forever sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The Asics sneakers are great looking, fit good, the price is fantastic for the quality, and they last almost forever
customer_reviews.author: Peet Piecoro

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Newer shoes made by Nike a little tighter than their older models. These Asics fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort in one.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I feel like a kid with these. Nice fit, color, and styling. I initially bought these because I wanted more support for my ankles, and was not disappointed. They're nice and snug, and because they've got some great padding up top around the upper ankle area, supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rev

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Buy. They straight up wear like 1985 Jordans. Better even.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Pealer

customer_reviews.title: SHOE fits perfect!! Except the TOEBOX...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits GREAT!!!! BUT the toebox is narrow.. and mid foot needs ARCH SUPPORT.. Get INSOLES but NOT thick insoles, bc the padding of the tounge is super thick, so not a lot of room. (But it makes it comfortable). Shoes are definitely great though.
customer_reviews.author: OG Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, I used with shoe inserts, most comfortable shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great look and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these high-tops. Look and feel great-just right. Wears well and look brand new after several wears.
customer_reviews.author: Steadyhand

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, old school
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, old school, and it feel great, I read that it came somehow small, so ordered a half size bigger, fit great, but not for those with wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: joel de la Torre

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like? The price was so reasonable
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? The price was so reasonable, fit perfect, and my teen received compliments on the looks of these kicks while on the court! They've been through one season of practice and games and are wearing well. We only use them in the gym and they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect old school looking shoe style and great comfort and fit
customer_reviews.author: Tselfrepair

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I've had in years
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I've had in years. Feels like I'm wearing a big comfy sock. They smell horrendous, but that's because I wear them almost everyday :P
customer_reviews.author: The Vegetable Kingdom

customer_reviews.title: *WHEN I WEAR THESE SHOES*
customer_reviews.text: How DOPE? R:) ASICS spotlyte retro,well let me tell you DO NOT count sheep on theses (asics) and miss out. Because:(when I WEAR these shoes) ITS TOO LATE.
customer_reviews.author: endland

customer_reviews.title: Great for actual play or casual wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I actually Do use them to play street basketball, I have a nice indoor pair didn’t want to ruin. These are very comfortable to play in and to wear as casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: You can call me Sir

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Third pair I bought, the others were for family. I well made shoe, quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: The width was good as he has a very wide foot they just ...
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a 13 in just about every brand of shoe. These seemed quite large however. The width was good as he has a very wide foot they just seemed longer then the other size 13's we have bought.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoes. I like the support basketball shoes have vs running shoes. will buy again some day
customer_reviews.author: Guy Bolich

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with a good classic shoe. And the is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Velez

customer_reviews.title: I made a good choice for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my grandson. He liked them right away and wears them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. Bought them once as a kid could never find them for years. Then I found these. These are great
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: OG Pistons Isiah Thomas signature shoe. Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Dope reissue of the OG Isiah Thomas’ 1992 signature shoe. Super comfortable with good support and rad throwback styling.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Loring

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the shoes...these are his first pair of Asics, the fit is perfect he is really happy with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my husband. He says they fit well, are very comfy and gets the support he was looking for from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe..made well....fits well....looks great...and comfortable. Very pleased with this product. Just got it and am breaking it in around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable shoes to play basketball in with good ankle support
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, I like it. Wanted to buy the black pair but none available in my size at that time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anamizu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, like the way it feels even without a breakin period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delightful to wear
customer_reviews.text: It feels so comfortable, inside is very soft and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real comfortable i played a good game on the court
customer_reviews.author: Curt Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Really well made
customer_reviews.text: Classic shoes. Great price. Really well made... last a long time and my hubby is HARD on his shoes. Great for running, work, or play.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitting Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked these old style shoes. The 3/4 ankle height is very comfortable and the support is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: they do the job but my foot floats on the inside... bulky style.
customer_reviews.author: 6LiSS

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. I am very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fall weather.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, warm fall shoes. Fits somewhat smaller due too the extra padding around the tongue and ankle. So I just tied it a bit looser. Its also stiffer and heavier than comparable classic Asics/Onitsukas like the Harandia. Overall a good everyday shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rasheid_G

customer_reviews.title: But they are VERY comfortable, so I'm glad I have them
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as basketball shoes. I see now my error there (which was not the seller's error)...these aren't really basketball shoes. But they are VERY comfortable, so I'm glad I have them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 1/2 size larger than mg sons shoe size ; he loves the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe, very comfortable, and delivered on time.Seemed a tad small for a 10 1/2 but guess that is due to the D width when I usually wear a wider shoe. ASICS meets my expectations and will most likely be considered again when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these, the description didn’t say for men.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

product_meta.title: ASICS Gel-Spotlyte-U
product_meta.description: In 1949, Mr. Kihachiro Onitsuka began his athletic footwear company (Onitsuka Co., Ltd.) by manufacturing basketball shoes out of his living room in Kobe, Japan. He chose the name ASICS for his company in 1977, based on a famous Latin phrase "Anima Sana In Corpore Sano," which, when translated, expresses the ancient ideal of "A Sound Mind in a Sound Body." Taking the acronym of this phrase, ASICS was founded on the belief that the best way to create a healthy and happy lifestyle is to promote total health and fitness. Today, ASICS offers a full line of performance-driven athletic shoes and technical active sports apparel and accessories dedicated to bringing harmony to the body and soul.
